title:
Philips Sonicare 4100 Power Toothbrush, Rechargeable Electric Toothbrush with Pressure Sensor, Black HX3681/24, removes up to 3x more plaque vs. a manual toothbrush, signals when your 2 minutes is up,
pressure sensor to prevent gun recession, includes 1 electric toothbrush, 1 SymplyClean brush head, 1 USB charger (without wall adaptor),
descriptions:
Introducing the Philips Sonicare 4100 Power Toothbrush (model HX3681/24), a rechargeable electric toothbrush designed to elevate your oral hygiene experience. This sleek, black toothbrush features the renowned Sonicare technology, ensuring up to 3x more plaque removal compared to a manual toothbrush.

Designed with your comfort in mind, the Philips Sonicare 4100 Power Toothbrush boasts a slim ergonomic design and a familiar head shape, making it easy to use and maneuver. The toothbrush features a 2-minute cleaning time, providing a month's worth of manual brushing in just one session.

This electric toothbrush is packed with features to ensure a comprehensive clean. It includes a pressure sensor that flashes red to prevent gum recession, a QuadPacer to ensure optimal time is spent on each mouth section, and a SmarTimer to keep your brushing on track. The toothbrush also offers 2 intensity settings, allowing you to customize your brushing experience.

Your Philips Sonicare 4100 Power Toothbrush comes with a SimplyClean (C1) brush head and a USB charger. Please note that the USB charger does not include a wall adapter. Experience the power of Sonicare technology and upgrade your oral care routine today.
